title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed; glazed
description: Ground decorated, by molette, in deep cream minute horizontal lines with areas of white moire effect. Pattern of natural size pansy clusters in reddish mauve and white printed over the ground, and small flower clusters in green-glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed; glazed. 1967-10-38.
